snippet: TPG Capital has agreed to buy the generic drug maker Par Pharmaceutical in a $1.9 billion leveraged buyout, as merger activity in the health care industry continues to heat up.
abstract: TPG Capital has agreed to buy the generic drug maker Par Pharmaceutical in a $1.9 billion leveraged buyout, as merger activity in the health care industry continues to heat up.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: TPG to Buy Par Pharmaceutical for $1.9 Billion
